name: Yargs Ahoy!
description:
Ahoy mateys! Have you ever wanted to sail the high seas? Look for buried treasure? Conquer the undead? Fight crabs?? Welcome to Yargs Ahoy!, the pirate roguelite where you can do all of the above and you’ll get a different experience every single time. See ye on the high seas!

Follow our progress on Medium!

https://medium.com/@jonahvincent
